Text: RE MRT Transport Cc Ed Attached is a list of the Central transport agreements for review We are not keeping any of the LDCs they deliver to and the transport has no value in the marketplacenot in the money Joe Original Message From McMichael Jr Ed Sent Tuesday January AM To Des Champs Joseph Black Don Little Kelli Garza Maria Germany Chris Cc Vanderhorst Barry Shireman Kristann Hewitt Jess P Draper David Subject RE MRT Transport Joe Thanks for the heads up We need to get information from you and others regarding EES capacity so we can compile the list to assume and cure postpetition claims or reject and terminaterelease We have already initiated this effort for EES and need to move to completion this week Chris Maria Kelli Please gather the information we already have and plan on getting together at AM today to discuss If you have any questions please ask Ed Original Message From Des Champs Joseph Sent Tuesday January AM To Black Don Cc McMichael Jr Ed Subject MRT Transport Don I was contacted by Mike Stoll with MRT Pipeline regarding our FirmTransport Agreements We have agreements of day ending and day ending totaling day delivering to LeClede This LDC is not on the Top ten list and we are incurring demand charges daily They offered to take back the transport at max rate which is what we paid I dont think it is something of value and we should go ahead and release it back to them They will draft up the paperwork and send to me for review What do you want to do Thanks Joe
